import './navbar.css'; import '../button/invButton.js' import InvButton from '../button/invButton.js'; function Navbar () { // Selectorn const menuDiv = document.getElementsByClassName("mobileNavbarPopup"); const hamburgerIcon = document.getElementsByClassName("hamburger-icon"); // Events menuDiv.addEventListener("click", openMenu); hamburgerIcon.addEventListener("click", closeMenu); function openMenu() { menuDiv.classList.remove("hide"); hamburgerIcon.src = "../assets/images/icon-close.svg"; } function closeMenu() { menuDiv.classList.add("hide"); hamburgerIcon.src = "../assets/images/icon-hamburger.svg"; } return (

); } export default Navbar;
